title: Go out with friends and have a good time.
Throw a party with friends and family.
Go for a swim at the beach.
Go try snorkeling or diving.
Happiness depends upon ourselves - Aristotle
Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions - Dalai Lama

If you want happiness for an hour-take a nap. If you want happiness for a day-go fishing. If you want happiness for a year-inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime-help someone else. - Chinese Proverb
Get with some friends and play a couple of board games.
Volunteer at community center.
Have a dog or cat spend some time with them as this will boost your mood even more.
Take up on learning to draw.
Maybe your house or office space needs a cleaning give it a nice tidy up.
Why not just stand up for a good stretch to relax the body.
Try your hand a sudoku puzzle.
Grab a pencil or fidget spinner to entertain your hands which require your mind to concentrate.
Try eating something out of the ordinary something exotic that way it livens up your taste buds.
A nice hot shower or bath might be what is needed at the moment to relax the body.
Take a few moments and read a book. Books are known for brighting peoples mood.
Go and give an act of kindness to someone else, by seeing a smile on their face could make one on yours.
Motivate yourself to complete at least one item on your list of things to do for that day.
Create some Artwork
Listen to Beautiful Music
Dance to your Favorite Songs
Do not dwell on the negative item, think of a way to make it positive.
Go out and try something new you have always wanted to try.
Play a game one that can really get your attention.
Take a watermelon see if you can squeeze it open with any part of your body.
Go watch a movie to take the mind of the object of your fustration.
Take a break from whatever you working on. Move on to another activity and come back later.
Try to meditate to clam the mind.
Never punch a wall or door, instead if a punching bag is near get in some cardio by practicing or use a mirror and shadow box.
Do not go for a ride, instead take a run to clear the emotions.
If needed just yell to the top of your lungs in your home or outside.  A good shout every now and then really helps in some cases.
Write out the anger in the journal to vent
Go to the gym and take angry out on weight or threadmill
